trans-unit.source: Indicates that ClickOnce could not read either the deployment or application manifests.
trans-unit.target: 指出 ClickOnce 無法讀取部署或應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException> indicates the existence of a corrupt deployment or application manifest in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException> 表示已損毀的部署或應用程式資訊清單中的是否存在[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The error might occur because the manifests are poorly formed, have unrecognized elements for their schemas, or have mismatched digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: 因為資訊清單格式不完整、 有無法辨認的元素的結構描述，或是有不相符的數位簽章，則可能會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: You are more likely to have corruption if you manually edit the deployment or application manifest files with a text editor.
trans-unit.target: 您會比較可能會損毀，如果您使用文字編輯器手動編輯部署或應用程式資訊清單檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can usually correct this problem by regenerating your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment, which will create new deployment and application manifests.
trans-unit.target: 您通常可以修正此問題，藉由重新產生您[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署，將會建立新的部署和應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed debugging steps, see the following links.
trans-unit.target: 如需更詳細的偵錯步驟，請參閱下列連結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> class with the specified message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用描述例外狀況的已指定訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
